title: Honkai Impact 3rd
description:
The definitive source of lore, background, and epic saga of Honkai Impact 3rd, a 3D anime-style ARPG game developed and published by miHoYo.

[i]History:[/i]
[*]1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin 
[*]2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia 
[*]2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

Honkai is a corrupting force that manifests itself as supernatural disasters, monstrous creatures, plagues, and Herrschers who can bend physical laws on a whim. Human civilization has been at war with the Honkai since the very beginning. The Valkyries are the mightiest warriors of humanity. They are our only hope.
[hr][b][u]Volume Guide (by chronological order):[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Ancient Era. Volume 0.01. Fu Hua's Empyrean tales. (DONE)
Ancient Shenzhou. Volume 0.011. Blade of the Empyrean. (NEW + Ongoing)
1476 AD. Volume 0.1 Elan Palatinus (DONE) 
[spoiler]1470: After a disastrous Crusade, Schicksal attempted to seek power elsewhere while Kallen Kaslana, the greatest Valkyrie of her time, began to question their actions.[/spoiler]
2000 CE. Volume 0.2: Second Eruption (DONE)  
[spoiler]2000-FEB-01: The entire research staff of Schicksal Babylon Honkai research facility in Siberia disappeared in a single night. Overseer Otto Apocalypse dispatched his 2nd in command Theresa Apocalypse to investigate this mystery. Welt and Einstein of Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, prepare for the worst. They suspect the 2nd Eruption is about to happen.[/spoiler]
2012-2013 CE. Volume 0.21: Gemini - Origin (DONE)
2012-2013 CE. Volume 0.3: Azure Waters (DONE) 
[spoiler]2012: Bronya Zaychik, the Silver Wolf of the Urals, finds herself adopted by Cocolia in her orphanage. Bronya would later befriend Seele, unaware of the tragedy that lays in wait for them.[/spoiler]
2014 CE. Volume 1: Escape from Nagazora (DONE)
2014 CE. Volume 2: St. Freya High (DONE)
2014 CE. Volume 3: Sakura Samsara (DONE) 
[spoiler]Theresa's innate eight-fold cherry blossom stigma malfunctioned and caused her to fall into a coma. To wake their principal, Mei entered the stigma data space to investigate the cause. Meanwhile, Theresa woke up in what appears to be medieval Japan and find herself embroiled in a never-ending Samsara.[/spoiler]
2014 CE. Volume 4: Final Samsara (DONE) 
[spoiler]A vengeful entity dwells within Theresa's innate stigma, and she must do what she can to prevent Yae Sakura's will to become forever corrupted by this ancient terror. Can Theresa defeat this monster, or will she lose herself to the endless cycle?[/spoiler]
2014 CE. Volume 5: AE Invasion (DONE) 
[spoiler]Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, made an attempt to kidnap the 3rd Herrscher - Mei Raiden. Will the Valkyries of St. Freya High defeat the invaders and save each other?[/spoiler]
2014 CE. Volume 6: Moon Shadow  (DONE) 
[spoiler]Fu Hua and Kiana goes to Singapore to recover a rogue scientist and a stolen gem, unaware of the terrible things that might happen.[/spoiler]
2016(?). Volume .22: Gemina Invasions (COMEDY)
2015 CE. Volume 7.1: London Holiday  (DONE) 
[spoiler]Durandal gets a holiday as a reward for her hardwork, while a mysterious force known as the World Serpent tries hard to defend a hidden Divine Key.[/spoiler]
2015 CE. Volume 8: Second Key (DONE) 
[spoiler]Schicksal initiated tests on the Second Key they've acquired from the city of London. Durandal didn't expect to find him inside the key.[/spoiler]
2005 / 2029 CE. Volume 9: Alien Space (ongoing) 
[spoiler]Young Himeko got into Caltech and met a surprisingly young substitute space engineering course lecturer who also happens to share her interest in space aliens.[/spoiler]
[/spoiler]
[hr]Visit the official site [url=http://www.global.honkaiimpact3.com]HERE[/url] to learn more (and download) the action-packed 3D anime style ARPG Honkai Impact 3 that this entire manga is based on. The game is a great place to learn more about the Honkai-verse.

[i]Other Links:[/i]
[*][url=https://apps.apple.com/us/app/honkai-impact-3rd/id1336342304]App Store link[/url]
[*][url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miHoYo.bh3oversea&hl=en]Google Play link[/url]
[*][url=https://www.bilibili.com/video/av2457024]Comic promotion PV[/url]
[*][url=https://www.bilibili.com/video/av6022195]Comic Commemorative MAD[/url]
